name: ZenX Data Manipulation Engine
short_description:
"ZenX" library is an object-oriented implementation of useful routines for data storage and manupulation. Though basics are quite simple and this library can be used by a man with no background in programming, it is still aimed for professional programmers, since main advantages come from overriding and/or extending methods provided herein. For those who is bothered reading this documentation - here is a link to ZenX Examples.

"ZenX" automates several data processing steps: input, verification, storage and retrieval; and also provides handy methods for its visualization and manipulation (like sorters, filters, table cell colorings etc).
summary: ZenX is data manupulation library for PHP
